nodes.title: Add isGliding check for elytras during a banner control session.
Changed terminology of "tactical invisibility" to "map sneaking"
Finish TODO regarding using new setCancellationMsg()
Fixed null pointers on message npc's/offline_players
Fixe null pointer exception with nation-delete
Punishes players who are not participating in the siege with war sick…
Adds Siege#getTimeRemaining() and removes two methods that did similar.
Adds a translatable name to the SiegeStatus enum.
Add siege status to sieges on dynmap.
Fix peacefuldays metadata being added when it shouldn't.
Fixed revolt feature to apply to all towns
SiegedTown maps will get updated as sieges start.
Fix peaceful towns being able to enable pvp. (Optional)
Adds internal support for Dynmap-Towny features present in Goosius' fork of Dynmap-Towny.
Reduce some message spam by changing global messages to nation/town messages.
Added to bc pause conditions - Nearby enemy soldiers who are on the BC list
Adjusts to use unlabeled metadata so that SW doesn't appear on Towny
Fix town screen presentation of siege balance
Updated perms terminology to match ingame texts & user guide
Remove glow when battle session ends
Put banner xyz on a config
Fixed bug where peaceful towns could not be plundered
updated lp glitch mitigation for current ranks
Remove glowing when player leaves the game
Cannons Integration - Turn town explosions off after siege
Removed peaceful towns attack validation check when peaceful.towns=disabled
Allows admins/ops to use their teleport commands in siege areas.
Allow non-plugin related causes to teleport players into siegezones
Remove ender pearl and chorus fruit from spawn restriction
Fixed horizontal distance to Towny TownyBlock size
Nation Screen - Remove ended sieges from siege attacks list
Prevent Nations from exploiting Peaceful-Town-Mechanics to create too-close battle-towns
Fix NPE when invading a town with a plot group
Fixed issue where abandoned sieges were still showing as swords on dynmap
Fix nation deletion listener using PreDeleteNationEvent.
Prevent usage of other plugins to teleport into siegezones
Take into account that some times the nation delete event can not return a proper king when being removed via safemode prevention.
Take into account that some times the nation delete event can not return a proper king when being removed via safemode prevention.
Spawn firework rocket when a player dies inside siege zone
Add more "unstable" blocks which the banner can't be placed on
Fix incorrect time showing in the hud for ended sieges.
Stop nations from removing nations they're sieging as enemies
Add Siegewar statistics to nation status screens
Fix resident nation-refund-amount not being set properly all of the time.
Adds /sw guide - which opens a guide book GUI.
Disable nation perms when town is invaded
Disable nation perms when town is invaded
Bump SiegeWar version number for release.
Add free nation choice for isolated peaceful towns
Fix calling on missing language string.
Adjusted default config for map sneak combos
Fix hud permission node not being give to everyone by default.
Adjusted default config value of max sieges per nation to 3
Fix config not properly reloading 4 variables.
Fix sending shutting down messages twice.
Fix ArrayOutOfBounds on empty /sw nation command.
Add optional increased cost for sieging capitals
Fix towns having pvp and explosions forced on
Remove glowing effect when player fails banner control
Reduce PlaceBlock messages when placing blocks in normal cases
Fixed Rounding bug w/ counterattack booster
Fixes for occupied town surrender & wall banners
Fix markers not being removed properly
Change counter-attack booster default to active
Drop the required MC version down to 1.13
Update link to license in pull_request_template.md
Changes to use the built-in MetaDataUtil found in Towny as of 0.97.2.0.
Fixes missing method in SiegeWarTownEventListener removed in the status screen update.
SW-359: Include PVP attribution text in siege-death messages
SW-353 Fix to prevent XP farming
Sw 360 Add num-banner-controllers to dynmap popup
Removes all println calls that paper has gotten naggy about.
Sw 331 - Restricted TNT & TNT-Minecarts in siegezone wilderness
SW-327 Added ruined towns to automatic dynmap hide
Add option to disable player glowing
Ta 325: Add feature to keep level on death
Ta 310 Fix issue with /n list ordering
remove double color code from lang file
Adds "axolotl_bucket" as default option in config.
SW-312 Fix NPE Exception with siege ending
Sw 247 Add two new occupation Commands
Sw 304 - Update cannon sessions to apply to all towns
SW-298 Added missing support for no-economy
Option to Disable Winner-Takes-All BattleSession Scoring.
T266 - Improvements to battle session scheduler
Improve experience for peaceful nation towns
Fixes using old getNationUUID() methods in the loading. Bumps version
Improved Siege Loading - better logging & goes safemode if a siege fails to load
Update min. Towny version to 0.97.0.0 and remove NRE and EconomyException catches.
Fixes plunder under REVOLT siege scenarios
Fix admin spawning into sieged towns
Fix nation towns not getting pvp off when besieged town leaves
Fixed bug with display of historical nation participants
Restrict homeblock move for sieged & occupied towns
Remove sieged restriction for guardian towns
Stop peaceful towns using homeblock-move exploit
Update home defence blurb to be clearer
Remove occupation when town goes to ruin
Synch terminology of nation war history with user-guide
Fix immunity help not being shown sometimes
Add feature to allow nations to choose which peaceful towns to occupy
Fix for index out of bounds exception
Fix trap mitigation explosion handling if the Cannons integration is disabled
Patch remaining methods to break siege banners
Fix bug with explosions bypassing trap mitigation
Move safe mode errors to the action bar.
